GSD.product_version: versions from v3.10 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
kernel/resource: fix kfree() of bootmem memory again

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit a9e88c2618d228d7a4e7e515cf30dc0d0d813f27, it was introduced in version v3.10 by commit ebff7d8f270d045338d9f4796014f4db429a17f9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: kernel/resource: fix kfree() of bootmem memory again
